alert.note: Alert for Geary; Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:23PM CDT until May 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GEARY...CENTRAL RILEY...POTTAWATOMIE...SOUTHWESTERN NEMAHA AND SOUTHEASTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1022 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Blaine to 5 miles east of Milford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Westmoreland, Blaine, Riley, Onaga, St. George, Milford, Olsburg, Havensville, Wheaton, Lillis, Keats, Tuttle Creek Lake and Milford Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
